Micro-cosmographie, or, A peece of the world discovered in essayes and characters. Earle, John, 1601?-1665.
[213] p.
Printed by William Stansby for Edward Blount, London : 1628.
Attributed to Earle by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints. Signatures: A⁶ B-I¹² K⁵. Imperfect: stained and tightly bound with slight loss of print. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
